title: Bitcoin Drops to Lowest Price Since Trump’s Election Victory
description: Bitcoin dropped to its lowest since Donald Trump retook the White House a little more than a year ago, erasing the gains registered by the bellwether digital asset since the election victory of the crypto-friendly US president.
content: Bitcoin dropped to its lowest since Donald Trump retook the White House a little more than a year ago, erasing the gains registered by the bellwether digital asset since the election victory of the crypto-friendly US president.
